name: Grand Budapest Hotel
description: A whimsical adventure by Wes Anderson, following the misadventures of a concierge and his protégé at a luxurious European hotel.

name: Bullet Train

name: Get Out
description: A chilling horror film by Jordan Peele, where a young African-American man uncovers disturbing secrets when visiting his white girlfriend's family estate.
